proposal: Peeling into the blockchain like a fresh orange, Pepe Orange brings a juicy burst of innovation and community spirit. 🍊 With 56 holders in the ETH network, you're already squeezing the best out of blockchain's potential. Why not zest up your project with our DEX or Lottery tools, letting anyone in your community deploy and share the revenue? It's like turning every slice of your orange into a piece ripe with opportunity. Let's grow together, one segment at a time.
